statements: SELECT experiment_name, experiment_result FROM experiments ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE experiment_result = 'Success';
SELECT * FROM experiments ORDER BY experiment_date ASC, experiment_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_experiments FROM experiments;
SELECT * FROM experiments ORDER BY experiment_date DESC, experiment_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT experiment_id, student_id, experiment_name FROM experiments WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_result FROM experiments WHERE experiment_result LIKE '%good%' AND experiment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY experiment_date ASC
SELECT * FROM experiments ORDER BY experiment_id DESC, experiment_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT result_id, experiment_id, student_id, result_data FROM results ORDER BY result_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM results WHERE student_id = 123;

SELECT * FROM experiments
WHERE experiment_date = '2022-08-15';

SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments
ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;

SELECT experiment_name AS 'Experiment Name', COUNT(result_id) AS 'Total Results'
FROM experiments
JOIN results ON experiments.experiment_id = results.experiment_id
GROUP BY experiment_name
HAVING COUNT(result_id) > 5;

SELECT experiment_name, result_data
FROM experiments
JOIN results ON experiments.experiment_id = results.experiment_id
WHERE result_data LIKE '%success%';

SELECT experiment_name, COUNT(student_id) AS 'Total Students'
FROM experiments
JOIN results ON experiments.experiment_id = results.experiment_id
GROUP BY experiment_name
ORDER BY 'Total Students' DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM Students ORDER BY student_age DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_age > 20;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM Experiments WHERE experiment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY experiment_date ASC;
SELECT student_id, SUM(result_value) AS total_result FROM Results GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_age > 18 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students JOIN Experiments ON Students.student_id = Experiments.student_id WHERE experiment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY student_grade DESC;

SELECT Students.student_name, Results.result_value FROM Students LEFT JOIN Experiments ON Students.student_id = Experiments.student_id LEFT JOIN Results ON Experiments.experiment_id = Results.experiment_id WHERE Results.result_value > 80;

SELECT Students.student_name, Experiments.experiment_name, Results.result_value FROM Students INNER JOIN Experiments ON Students.student_id = Experiments.student_id LEFT JOIN Results ON Experiments.experiment_id = Results.experiment_id ORDER BY Results.result_value DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT Students.student_name, Students.student_age, Experiments.experiment_name FROM Students JOIN Experiments ON Students.student_id = Experiments.student_id WHERE Students.student_grade >= 90;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade_level > 5;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT sample_name FROM samples WHERE experiment_id = 2 ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT result_value FROM results WHERE sample_id = 5 AND result_value > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM students
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10
SELECT experiments.experiment_name, samples.sample_name FROM experiments INNER JOIN samples ON experiments.experiment_id = samples.experiment_id

SELECT students.student_name, experiments.experiment_date, results.result_value FROM students INNER JOIN experiments ON students.student_id = experiments.student_id INNER JOIN samples ON experiments.experiment_id = samples.experiment_id INNER JOIN results ON samples.sample_id = results.sample_id
SELECT student_id, student_name, COUNT(experiment_id) AS num_experiments FROM students LEFT JOIN experiments ON students.student_id = experiments.student_id GROUP BY student_id, student_name
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT experiment_type, result FROM experiments;
SELECT student_name, student_grade, study_group FROM students;
SELECT chemical_name, quantity, storage_location FROM chemicals;
SELECT equipment_name, condition FROM lab_equipment;
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT student_id, experiment_type, result FROM experiments ORDER BY result DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_grade, study_group FROM students WHERE student_grade = 'A';
SELECT * FROM lab_equipment WHERE condition = 'Good' ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT chemical_name, quantity, storage_location FROM chemicals WHERE quantity > 10;
